table_caption: Cross-validation results using the data of each scanner as fold.
table_foot: For each modality the average number of informative voxels is provided and in parentheses the proportion compared to the respective tissue masks is presented.Abbreviations: FA, fractional anisotropy; MD, mean diffusivity; WMD, white matter density; GMD, gray matter density; ML, machine learning; SVM, Support Vector Machine; NB, Naïve Bayes.
